name: Phantom Brave Portable
description:
We Meet Again! Again... With Even More This Time!
In the world of Ivoire, there is a place called Phantom Isle. Here, spirits can return to the world as phantoms, caught between death and life. Phantom Brave takes a new spin with new events involving the Heroes of the Hermuda Triangle!
Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item.
